message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I think you'd be very interested in. I'm asking for $90 for it. What do you think?
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $90 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now. I'm interested in the product, but I can only go up to $85. What do you think?
Bob, I appreciate your offer. While I understand your position, I'm still looking for a bit more. I'm willing to come down to $87.  I think that's a fair price considering the value of the product.
